"Kabrakan":
"Ah, oh dear!
I forgot that we can't get past here with
that fence there!"

"/ci1 1 There must be a release switch here
somewhere.
Let's first look for it."

"Although I know we cannot pass here due to
that fence, it seems like someone has
released that for us."

"Anyway, if this road leads to the
North, let's go!"
